Uses of Class
modele.Rider

  • Uses of Rider in modele

    Fields in modele with type parameters of type Rider
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<Rider> Game.riders
    List of the players of the game
    Methods in modele with parameters of type Rider
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void Game.end​(Rider r)
    Prints the results of the race
    void Board.followPath​(Rider r, int n)
    Allow to move the rider of several cases according to his path, First it checks what player has to move since they don't have the same path, Then while the rider hasn't moved of the number of cell he has to it checks where it is and move it to the next cell
    private void Game.go​(Rider r1, Rider r2, int de)
    Allows to move a player of a number of case given by the dice, If it lands on the same case as the other rider the other rider will be sent back to it's start, and if the rider is already on it's start it will go back to it's stable.
    private void Game.goStable​(Rider r)
    Sends a rider back to the stable cell
    private void Game.goStart​(Rider r)
    Sends a rider back to the start cell
    void Board.move​(Rider r, Position from, Position to)
    Move a rider from a cell to another, Checks if the new position is valid then move the rider to it
    java.lang.String CellFinish.process​(Rider r)
    Function used to process the effect of the cell on the player and explains this effect
    java.lang.String CellFree.process​(Rider r)
    Function used to process the effect of the cell on the player and explains this effect
    java.lang.String CellHedge.process​(Rider r)
    Function used to process the effect of the cell on the player and explains this effect, Sets the boolean hedge of the player to true
    java.lang.String CellHole.process​(Rider r)
    Function used to process the effect of the cell on the player and explains this effect, Increments or reset the counter of turns spend in a hole of the player
    java.lang.String CellRiver.process​(Rider r)
    Function used to process the effect of the cell on the player and explains this effect, Sets the river boolean of the rider to true
    java.lang.String CellStable.process​(Rider r)
    Function used to process the effect of the cell on the player and explains this effect
    java.lang.String CellStart.process​(Rider r)
    Function used to process the effect of the cell on the player and explains this effect
    java.lang.String Questionnable.process​(Rider r)
    Function used to process the effect of the cell on the player and explains this effect
    java.lang.String Board.toString​(Rider r1, Rider r2)
    Allows to represent the board of the game, shows the players and all the specials cells
    private boolean Game.turn​(Rider r1, Rider r2)
    Allows to make a turn, Ask the player to press enter to roll the dice (or to enter the value for the evaluation version).
    Method parameters in modele with type arguments of type Rider
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Board.init​(java.util.List<Rider> riders)
    Initialize the board Put CellWhite where the players doesn't go, CellFree where they can go, CellSide around the board, CellStart, CellFinish and CellStable of each players, CellRiver, CellHole and CellHedge according to the board we where given in class
